GAME_PATH.LABEL: Game Executable File
GAME_PATH.HELP: Select aomrt_s.exe from your game directory (usually located in "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Age of Mythology Retold")
GAME_PATH.ERROR: Please select a valid directory containing aomrt_s.exe

MODS_PATH.LABEL: Mods Status File
MODS_PATH.HELP: Select myth-mod-status.json from your mods directory (usually located in "C:\Users\<YourUsername>\Games\Age of Mythology Retold\<SteamID>\Mods")
MODS_PATH.ERROR: Please select a valid directory containing myth-mod-status.json

FORM.ERROR: Please fix all errors before saving.

MESSAGES.WELCOME_SETUP: Welcome! Please configure your game paths to get started with advanced features.

CACHE.TITLE: Clear Application Cache
CACHE.DESCRIPTION: Remove all cached data, settings, and reload the application

USER_CONFIG.TITLE: User Configuration Manager
USER_CONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Manage advanced game settings in user.cfg file

CONFIGS.aiDebug: Enables extra debug logging and UI for the AI.
CONFIGS.aiShowBPValueText: Display AI blueprint value text information in-game.
CONFIGS.dataValidation: Enable data validation checks during game runtime.
CONFIGS.dataValidationOnDebugRandomMaps: Validate data specifically for random map generation.
CONFIGS.debugOutputGameData: Output detailed game data for debugging purposes.
CONFIGS.debugRandomMaps: Required for the XS debugger to be used, always add this.
CONFIGS.debugTriggers: Required for the XS debugger to be used with the trigger runtime.
CONFIGS.developer: Enable developer mode with additional tools and features.
CONFIGS.disableAssetPreloading: Disables asset preloading when starting a game for shorter load times.
CONFIGS.enableTriggerEcho: Required to get any trigger echo output as these will be optimized away otherwise.
CONFIGS.generateAIConstants: Generates MythAIConstantsPlayerXX.txt in temp/Logs containing all available global constants for AI players.
CONFIGS.generateRMConstants: Generates MythRMConstants.txt in temp/Logs containing all available global constants for RMs.
CONFIGS.generateTRConstants: Generates MythTRConstants.txt in temp/Logs containing all available global constants for triggers.
CONFIGS.noIntroCinematics: Disables the intro cinematics for a faster startup.
CONFIGS.showAIEchoes: Display AI echo messages in the debug output.
CONFIGS.showAIOutput: Show detailed AI decision-making output for analysis.

MESSAGES.LOAD_ERROR: Failed to load user configuration file
MESSAGES.FILE_NOT_FOUND: user.cfg file not found, creating new configuration
